channel.title: Finally
channel.description: Ok, so I finally got my game ready, how do I become a mod on it? I downloaded it, and when I xed out of internet exp. It said MoparScape, so I click on the Java icon on the screen and then it downloaded. So like now how do I become a mod on it and stuff? Like the J-mod gold crown and stuff.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 03:21:06 pm[/size][hr]Also how would I be able to get items within the game?

item.title: Finally
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If youâ€™re playing on localhost you cant. You have to make a server, go on it, set playerRights, and it looks like you are new so go to the tutorials and click " How to make a server"
